code: import{Card,CardHeader,CardBody,CardTitle,Button,CardText}from'reactstrap';import Swal from'sweetalert2';import withReactContent from'sweetalert2-react-content';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var MySwal=withReactContent(Swal);var SweetAlertPositions=function SweetAlertPositions(){var handleTopStart=function handleTopStart(){return MySwal.fire({position:'top-start',icon:'success',title:'Your work has been saved',showConfirmButton:false,timer:1500});};var handleTopEnd=function handleTopEnd(){return MySwal.fire({position:'top-end',icon:'success',title:'Your work has been saved',showConfirmButton:false,timer:1500});};var handleBottomStart=function handleBottomStart(){return MySwal.fire({position:'bottom-start',icon:'success',title:'Your work has been saved',showConfirmButton:false,timer:1500});};var handleBottomEnd=function handleBottomEnd(){return MySwal.fire({position:'bottom-end',icon:'success',title:'Your work has been saved',showConfirmButton:false,timer:1500});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardHeader,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardTitle,{tag:"h4",children:"Position"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardBody,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardText,{className:"mb-0",children:["You can specify position of your alert with",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("code",{children:'position : top-start | top-end | bottom-start | bottom-end '}),' ']}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"demo-inline-spacing",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{color:"primary",onClick:handleTopStart,outline:true,children:"Top Start"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{color:"primary",onClick:handleTopEnd,outline:true,children:"Top End"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{color:"primary",onClick:handleBottomStart,outline:true,children:"Bottom Start"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{color:"primary",onClick:handleBottomEnd,outline:true,children:"Bottom End"})]})]})]});};export default SweetAlertPositions;
